subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Mark Appel’s stock plummeted before last year’s M.L.B. draft because of his potential salary demands, and although he pitched even better this year, he still may not be taken first over all.
snippet: Mark Appel’s stock plummeted before last year’s M.L.B. draft because of his potential salary demands, and although he pitched even better this year, he still may not be taken first over all.
